Installation¶

Requirements¶

Todo

Installing¶

The complete IRCO suite, including its requirements, can be installed though pip by issuing the followin command:

pip install irco

Upgrading¶

It is possible to upgrade the IRCO tool to its latest version by issuing the following command:

pip install --upgrade irco
